properties.areaDesc: Wilcox, AL; Dallas, AL; Monroe, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 10:51AM CST by NWS Mobile AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama and Florida...

Escambia River Near Century affecting Escambia County.

...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama...
Mississippi...

Tombigbee River Near Leroy affecting Choctaw...Clarke and Washington
Counties.
Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam affecting Dallas...Monroe and Wilcox
Counties.
Alabama River Near Claiborne Dam - Tailwater affecting Clarke...Monroe and
Wilcox Counties.
Leaf Near Mclain affecting George...Greene and Perry Counties.
Chickasawhay At Leakesville affecting George...Greene and Wayne Counties.
Pascagoula At Merrill affecting George...Greene and Jackson Counties.

.Recent heavy rains have caused significant rises along the river.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam
* until further notice.
* At 09AM Tuesday the stage was 70.1 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 66.0 feet.
* The river will continue rising to near 76.0 feet by Sunday morning.
Additional rises may be possible thereafter.
* At 80.0 feet...Flooding of some fishing camps as well as a few secondary roads
will occur at these stages.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...
Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather radio.
